channel.title: Geo open data on Fernando Benitez-Paez
channel.description: Recent content in Geo open data on Fernando Benitez-Paez

item.title: Creating a conceptual framework to improve the re-usability of open geographic data in cities
item.description: This article, based on data collected through an on-line survey, participatory workshops with data user communities in four cities (in Colombia and Spain), and interviews with Valencia good-government office, identifies four elements for a conceptual framework to improve the re-usability of open geographic data in cities.
